section.para: When reserving inventory quantity to a sales order line item, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Parent sales order the line item belongs to.
Line item number for the sales order item.
Item number for the sales order item.
Sales order item Unit of Measure.
Site the sales order item is sold from.
Remaining line item quantity which has not yet been shipped.
Line item quantity currently at Shipping.
Total line item quantity currently not reserved.
Total line item quantity currently reserved for this sales order item.
The following Availability information for the sold-from site will be displayed:
Quantity available immediately to satisfy Work Order and sales order demand.
Total quantity of reservations for the specified item in sold-from site.
Total quantity available to be reserved for the specified item in sold-from site.
Enter the quantity of inventory you would like to reserve to the specified line item.

tip.para: You may only reserve quantity to the line item if there is available QOH for the item. Also, you may not reserve more than the balance due.

listitem.para: Sales order item Unit of Measure.

section.para: The following buttons are unique to this screen:

listitem.para: Reserves the indicated quantity to the specified sales order item.
